title: JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon Gets a $3 Million Raise to $34.5 Million for 2021; Bank posted record revenue and profit for 2021
text:
Outside of the annual pay, the JPMorgan board had also awarded Mr. Dimon a $50 million special bonus earlier in 2021 meant to entice him into staying at the bank for at least five more years.

Write to David Benoit at david.benoit@wsj.com

JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon Gets a $3 Million Raise to $34.5 Million for 2021
